io.spine.server.entity

Class Repository<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Repository<I,E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, RepositoryView<I,E>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregateRepository, RecordBasedRepository

    public abstract class Repository<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RepositoryView<I,E>, java.lang.AutoCloseable, io.spine.logging.Logging
    Abstract base class for repositories.

      Creates the repository.

        protected final BoundedContext getBoundedContext()
        Obtains BoundedContext to which this repository belongs.
        Returns:
        parent BoundedContext
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the repository is not registered registered yet

      • onRegistered

        @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper
public void onRegistered()
        The callback called by a BoundedContext during the registration of the repository.

        If entities managed by this repository are versionable, registers itself as a type supplier with the Stand of the parent parent BoundedContext.

      • create

        public abstract E create(I id)
        Create a new entity instance with its default state.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the entity
        Returns:
        new entity instance

      • store

        protected abstract void store(E obj)
        Stores the passed object.

        NOTE: The storage must be assigned before calling this method.

        Parameters:
        obj - an instance to store

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<E> iterator(java.util.function.Predicate<E> filter)
        Returns an iterator over the entities exposed by the view that match the passed filter.

        The returned iterator does not support removal.

        Iteration through entities is performed by loading them one by one.

        Specified by:
        iterator in interface RepositoryView<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>
        Parameters:
        filter - the Predicate.test(Object) filtering} predicate
        Returns:
        new iterator

      • initStorage

        public void initStorage(StorageFactory factory)
        Initializes the storage using the passed factory.
        Parameters:
        factory - storage factory
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the repository already has storage initialized

      • getStorage

        protected final Storage<I,?,?> getStorage()
        Returns the storage assigned to this repository.

        In order to verify if the storage is assigned use Repository.isStorageAssigned().

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the storage is not assigned

      • isStorageAssigned

        public final boolean isStorageAssigned()
        Returns true if the storage is assigned, false otherwise.

      • checkStorage

        protected static <S extends java.lang.AutoCloseable> S checkStorage(S storage)
        Ensures that the storage is not null.
        Returns:
        passed value if it's not not null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the passed instance is null

      • createStorage

        protected abstract Storage<I,?,?> createStorage(StorageFactory factory)
        Creates the storage using the passed factory.

        Implementations are responsible for properly calling the factory for creating the storage, which is compatible with the repository.

        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to create the storage
        Returns:
        the created storage instance

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the repository by closing the underlying storage.

        The reference to the storage becomes null after this call.

        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Verifies if the repository open.

      • logError

        protected void logError(java.lang.String msgFormat,
                        io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope envelope,
                        java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
        Logs error caused by a message processing into the repository log.

        The formatted message has the following parameters:

        1. The name of the message class.
        2. The message ID.
        3. The entity type URL.
        Parameters:
        msgFormat - the format of the message
        envelope - the envelope of the message caused the error
        exception - the error

      • eventFilter

        @SPI
 @Pure
protected EventFilter eventFilter()
        Creates an EventFilter for this repository.

        All the events posted by this repository, domain and system, are first passed through this filter.

        By default, the filter allows all the events to be posted. Override this method to change this behaviour.

        Returns:
        an EventFilter to apply to all posted events
